              Turjya Laskar

            Bio
            With profound expertise in biostatistics and clinical
            research, I specialize in delivering insightful analyses and
            innovative solutions across diverse areas, including
            survival analysis, meta-analysis, and machine learning.
            Leveraging my strong background in public health, I excel in
            applying statistical methods to unravel complex data, drive
            evidence-based decision-making, and contribute to
            advancements in medical research.
            My proficiency extends across a range of statistical
            software and programming languages, ensuring a robust
            approach to data analysis and interpretation. Committed to
            enhancing research outcomes and improving public health
            strategies, I bring a combination of analytical skills,
            domain knowledge, and dedication to excellence in every
            project I undertake.
            Whether you’re seeking expertise in clinical trial
            analysis, survival data modeling, or integrating machine
            learning techniques into your research, I offer a
            comprehensive and meticulous approach to meet your
            biostatistical needs.
            
            
            Education
            Institute of Medical Sciences, BHU |
            Varanasi, IN
            Msc in Bio statistics | December 2021 - December 2023
            Gurucharan College, Silchar | Assam,
            IN
            Bsc in Statistics | July 2017 - December 2021
            
            
            Experience
            AIIMS Gorakhpur | External Bio
            statistical Consultant | May 2024 - Present
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Turjya Laskar
